title: Create API request/response models with Schematic derivation
Add BoogieLoops schema + web dependencies to build.mill
epic
description:
Port the formatting, linting, and pre-commit tooling from BoogieLoops to ObjectStorage.

## What's in BoogieLoops
- Scalafmt for formatting (already have .scalafmt.conf)
- Scalafix for linting with DisableSyntax guardrails (already have .scalafix.conf)
- Makefile with build/format/lint/test targets
- Husky pre-commit hooks (format + build)
- commitlint for conventional commits
- CI runs build + tests (lint commented out)

## Current State in ObjectStorage
- .scalafmt.conf ✓
- .scalafix.conf ✓ (needs import group fix)
- No Makefile
- No Husky/pre-commit hooks
- No commitlint
- CI has format check but continue-on-error: true

## Subtasks
1. ObjectStorage-4bz.1 - Create Makefile
2. ObjectStorage-4bz.2 - Add Scalafix to build.mill
3. ObjectStorage-4bz.3 - Fix .scalafix.conf import groups
4. ObjectStorage-4bz.4 - Setup Husky
5. ObjectStorage-4bz.5 - Add commitlint
6. ObjectStorage-4bz.6 - Update CI

title: task
description:
Create Makefile with modular structure like BoogieLoops:

Files to create:
- Makefile (main entry point, includes makefiles/*.mk)
- makefiles/build.mk (format, fmt, format-check, lint, fix, build)
- makefiles/test.mk (test, test-only)
- makefiles/ci.mk (check, ci)

Key targets:
- make format - run scalafmt
- make lint - run scalafix
- make build - compile
- make test - run tests
- make check - build + test + lint
- make ci - clean + check

title: task
description:
Add Scalafix integration to build.mill.

BoogieLoops uses Coursier to launch scalafix dynamically:
```scala
def fix() = Task.Command {
  os.proc("cs", "launch", "scalafix", "--",
    "--config", configPath,
    "--scala-version", "3.7.2",
    "--syntactic",
    sourceFiles
  ).call()
}
```

Need to add similar fix/fixCheck tasks to ObjectStorage's build.mill.

title: task
description:
Update .scalafix.conf import groups.

Current groups reference 'objectstorage.' which is correct.
But BoogieLoops has 'com.silvabyte' - verify the grouping is right for this project.

Also verify DisableSyntax rules are appropriate:
- noVars = true
- noNulls = true  
- noThrows = true

title: task
description:
Setup Husky pre-commit hooks.

Files to create:
- package.json (with prepare script for husky)
- .husky/pre-commit (runs: make format && make build)
- .husky/commit-msg (runs: npx commitlint --edit $1)

Requires npm install to trigger husky setup.

title: task
description:
Add commitlint for conventional commits.

Files to create:
- commitlint.config.js (extends @commitlint/config-conventional)

Update package.json devDependencies:
- @commitlint/cli
- @commitlint/config-conventional
- husky

title: task
description:
Update CI workflow to run lint checks.

Current state:
- Format check runs but has continue-on-error: true

Changes needed:
- Add lint step (make lint or mill __.fixCheck)
- Remove continue-on-error from format check
- Consider if lint should block PRs or just warn
